stripped_text: Play only as your first click and only if the Corp scored no agendas during their last turn. Gain 10 credits. The Corp gains 5 credits. You cannot make any runs this turn.
text:
Play only as your first [click] and only if the Corp scored no agendas during their last turn.
Gain 10[credit]. The Corp gains 5[credit]. You cannot make any runs this turn.
title: Peace in Our Time
